title: New built luxury house for sale in Kandy (Including furniture)
details:
This is a 3 story new built, fully furnished, luxury house with modern architecture and situated in Summerfield Gardens, vicinity of Pallekelle International Cricket Stadium and BOI. Only 250 meters to Kandy - Mahiyangane main road, 12km to Kandy city and 3.5km to Digana. Very tranquil environment and a friendly neighborhood.

The house contains 4 bedrooms including a large master bedroom with a panoramic view balcony, 3 bathrooms, 2 large living room, dining space, large kitchen, a garage for two vehicles. Also includes hot water, electricity, telephone & fiber broadband.

The house itself is 4,500 sq ft in a 13.9 perches land and will be selling FURNISHED.
